# Welcome

## Quiz 5

For the quiz tomorrow, please review the following things:

- How to convert a number from decimal (e.g. 42) to an 8 bit unsigned binary integer
- How to convert a number from decimal (e.g. -42) to an 8 bit two's complement integer
- How to interpret a 16 bit floating point number in terms of decimal
